programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 219
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 220
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
programme.desc: Friendship takes a violent turn when Adora (played by Nora Aunor) finds that she's a pawn in the intriguing games in life and love being played by her employer and close friend Renee (played by Hilda Koronel.).

programme.title: Afterlife ep 8
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Kagat ng Dilim 2020 ep 8
programme.desc: REBOOT: Urban legends and urban horror stories set against a backdrop of modern-day events and headlines, terrifying tales told in mock-documentary style make up this groundbreaking original horror series.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 7
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Sing Galing: Singlebrity Edition ep 38
programme.desc: Sing Galing: Sing-lebrity Edition, aims to provide fun, laughter, music and excitement with the added goal of helping as celebrities sing and play for their chosen beneficiaries.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 22
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 5
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 5
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Team A S1 ep 5
programme.desc: Janet and Ian started a simple life together, but will their maried life be as happy as they dreamed to be when both their parents treat each other as enemy?

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 5
programme.desc:
Di Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her 
life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much 
time remains of someone’s life) but ends up falling in love with the man 
who caused the death of her one great lov.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 1
programme.desc:
This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a 
loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for 
the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he 
vowed to seek revenge against the influential 
retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.desc: The Philippines's premier award-winning agriculture show. The program showcases success stories in Filipino innovation, resilience, and growing agribusiness opportunities.

programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.desc: A riotously funny comedy about the life of a married couple.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Resibo: Walang Lusot Ang May Atraso
programme.desc: A public service program aimed at giving a voice to the public's grievances and complaints, exposing wrongdoing, and providing concrete resolutions.

programme.title: Agripreneur
programme.desc: The Philippines's premier award-winning agriculture show. The program showcases success stories in Filipino innovation, resilience, and growing agribusiness opportunities.

programme.title: The Boobay And Tekla Show
programme.desc: A comedy program that features a wide range of hilarious discussion topics in pop culture, entertainment, current events, society, sports, cyber culture and more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: House Of Lies
programme.desc: House of Lies is an intense, family-centered drama about two mothers who face off against each other. Shaped by painful pasts, they clash in a fierce battle marked by betrayal, hidden family secrets, and a fight for survival.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Friends In Love (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Set in the sprawling campus of Brent School in scenic Baguio City, young stars Sharon, William, Jackie Lou and Rowell played a game of romantic musical chairs in this heartwarming story. Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Jesus Calderon (Maton)
programme.desc: This is another take-off on the eternal poor boy loves rich girl tale. Love wins out in the end but only after Jesus Calderon has proven himself, and the lovely damsel in distress has learned to love and trust him with all her heart.

programme.title: Sinasamba Kita (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lorna, the illegitimate daughter of a business tycoon was left in the care of her half-sister, Vilma, upon the death of their father. Though she took care of all her material needs, she refused to show the girl any kind of affection.

programme.title: Sagad Hanggang Buto
programme.desc: When his parents are killed by assassins in the family car, Banjo is adopted by the thief who took his dead parents' wallet. Raised in poverty and used to surviving with his wits, he grows up as the town's resident hoodlum.

programme.title: Where 'D' Girls 'R'
programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod The Movie
programme.desc: The movie version of the popular TV sitcom, Ober De Bakod. This is a story of two families, always in competition -- they are actually neighbors. In this movie, the parents continue to fight and outdo each other, while the children continue their love affairs with each other. However, this time, they all go on holiday -- separately of course. It does not start well, as they all ended up in an isla

programme.title: Diligan Man Ng Dugo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo is an idealistic Army Captain who believes in the government's reform programs for the people of Mindanao. In fact, he is in constant dialogue with different Muslim hardliners regarding the matter.

programme.title: Barumbado
programme.desc: A young hoodlum spawned and raised by a tough neighborhood goes out looking for love and an escape from the harsh realities of everyday life.

programme.title: Sugo
programme.desc: Dan (Mark Gil) is languishing in jail for a crime he did not commit. He is accused of murdering his girlfriend.

programme.title: Cuadro De Jack
programme.desc: Young comedians Nino, Keempee, Dennis and Smokey starred in this 90's remake of a blockbuster hit. The Filipino version of the cowboy and Indians war made all the more appealing by the laugh-filled sequences featuring the inept, but trying hard bunch of heroes.

programme.title: The Untouchable Family
programme.desc: Ma Barker and sons Mad Max, Machinegun Nonong and Pretty Boy Fredo want to be the number one criminal family in the land.

programme.title: Working Girls 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Working Girls 2 is a funny yet insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a go of their chosen careers despite the prejudices encountered by the female gender. Viewers are sure to identify with any of the characters as the experiences of working women are well represented here.

programme.title: Alfredo Lim: Batas Ng Maynila
programme.desc: This film is based on the life story of policeman Alfredo Lim who rose from street cop to director of the National Bureau of Investigation and eventually Mayor of the City of Manila.

programme.title: Talahib At Rosas
programme.desc: Heiress Anjanette Abayari, who had just arrived from the US, was abducted by rebels while on her way home to see her father. Experienced tracker Cesar Montano, who was serving time in jail, was released to find her in exchange for his freedom.

programme.title: Abot Hanggang Sukdulan
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of the eldest daughter shattered the once happy Paredes household. They vowed to get justice for their daughter but changed their plan when Romano offered marriage after it was discovered that Agnes was pregnant.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang
programme.desc: A librarian's husband turn out to be psychotically abusive. When the husband mistakenly thinks he has killed her, he dumps her in a river. In need of help to take revenge, she hooks up with a bank robber and together they kill him.

programme.title: The Maggie Dela Riva Story
programme.desc: Maggie Dela Riva was a popular young actress in 1969 when she was abducted and raped by four men from rich, influential families. Concerned about the rising number of crimes against women, Maggie came out of retirement to once more tell her story.

programme.title: Onyok Velasco Story
programme.desc: Born to a family of boxers, Onyok Velasco ate and breathed boxing. The whole nation watched his fight, hoping and praying for Onyok to win the gold. Robbed of the gold or not, Onyok, without doubt, came home victorious.

programme.title: Dugong Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Father and son were unknowingly pitted against each other in this tale of a man determined to hate his enemy all his life and who, one day, would exact revenge in the most cruel manner even if it took him years and years of plotting and waiting.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Alam Mo Ba?
programme.desc: In his rush to escape from the policemen, Mario disguised himself as an Arab. At that same moment, Teresa was waiting for the Arab prince she was supposed to marry, whom she has never seen before. In the rush, she thought Mario was her prince and brought him home to meet her parents.
